title: Roar
lyrics:
[intro] (G) (G-Am) (Em) (Em)
(G) I used to bite my tongue and hold my breath
Scared to rock the (Am)boat and make a mess
(Em) So I sat quietly, agree po-(C)litely
(G) I guess that I forgot I had a choice
I let you push me (Am)past the breaking point
(Em) I stood for no-othing, so I fell for e-(C)verything
 
You (G)held me down but I got up (hey!)
Already brushing (Am)off the dust
You (Em)hear my voice, you hear that sound
Like thunder gonna’ (C)shake the crowd
You (G)held me down but I got up (hey!)
Get ready cos’ I’ve (Am)had enough
I (Em)see it all, I see it now
 
[chorus]
I got the (C)eye of the ti-(G)ger, the fighter, dancing through the fi-(Am)re
Cos’ I (Em) am a champion, and you’re gonna hear (C) me ro-(G)ar
Louder, louder than a li-(Am)on, cos’ I (Em) am a champion
And you’re gonna hear (C) me ro-(G)ar
O-o-oh oh oh oh oh o-o-oh, o-o-oh oh oh (Am)oh oh o-o-oh
(Em) O-o-oh oh oh oh oh o-o-oh, you’re gonna hear (C) me ro-(G)ar [pause]
 
(G) Now I’m floating like a butterfly,
Stinging like a (Am)bee, I earned my stripe
(Em) I went from ze-ero, to my own (C)he-ero
 
You (G)held me down but I got up (hey!)
Already brushing (Am)off the dust
You (Em)hear my voice, you hear that sound
Like thunder gonna (C)shake the crowd
You (G)held me down but I got up (hey!)
Get ready cos’ I’ve (Am)had enough
I (Em)see it all, I see it now
 
[chorus]
I got the (C)eye of the ti-(G)ger, the fighter, dancing through the fi-(Am)re
Cos’ I (Em) am a champion, and you’re gonna hear (C) me ro-(G)ar
Louder, louder than a li-(Am)on, cos’ I (Em) am a champion
And you’re gonna hear (C) me ro-(G)ar
O-o-oh oh oh oh oh o-o-oh, o-o-oh oh oh (Am)oh oh o-o-oh
(Em) O-o-oh oh oh oh oh o-o-oh, you’re gonna hear (C) me ro-(G)ar
O-o-oh oh oh oh oh o-o-oh, o-o-oh oh oh (Am)oh oh o-o-oh
(Em) O-o-oh oh oh oh oh o-o-oh, you’re gonna hear (C) me ro-(G)ar
 
[bridge]
(G) (G-Am) (Em)
(D) Roar, roar, (D) roar, roar, (D) roaaaar! [stop]
 
[chorus]
I got the (C)eye of the ti-(G)ger, the fighter, dancing through the fi-(Am)re
Cos’ I (Em) am a champion, and you’re gonna hear (C) me ro-(G)ar
Louder, louder than a li-(Am)on, cos’ I (Em) am a champion
And you’re gonna hear (C) me ro-(G)ar
O-o-oh oh oh oh oh o-o-oh, o-o-oh oh oh (Am)oh oh o-o-oh
(Em) O-o-oh oh oh oh oh o-o-oh, you’re gonna hear (C) me ro-(G)ar
O-o-oh oh oh oh oh o-o-oh, o-o-oh oh oh (Am)oh oh o-o-oh
(Em) O-o-oh oh oh oh oh o-o-oh, you’re gonna hear (C) me ro-(G)ar
[end]
